title: SKINS
body: i just bought a new skin (panada annie) then i logged out to do something, when i re-logged in it said invalid skin. when i went in to my purchases it said i own it i dont what happened i cant use the skin and i lost the riot points for it. please help :(

replies.body: Have you try relogging? maybe try repairing

Hiya! 

For something like this, you'll need to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584). Player supprot will be able to look into your account and see what may have happened.
